changelog.title: CASP+ Security Architecture
changelog.description: Advanced security architecture content from CASP+ curriculum now available in Shield House.

changelog.title: Zero Trust Visualizer
changelog.description: NIST SP 800-207 tenets, deperimeterization, microsegmentation with interactive diagrams.

changelog.title: IR & Forensics Lab
changelog.description: NIST SP 800-61R2 incident response lifecycle, RFC 3227 volatility, forensic tools reference.

changelog.title: ICS/SCADA Security Simulator
changelog.description: Industrial control systems, PLCs, RTUs, HMIs, Modbus/DNP3 protocols, attack simulations.
